Master_Service_Agreement.section_text:
Blackbay III Holdings ("Client") engages Veridian Atlas Partners ("Service Provider") to perform data infrastructure, risk-model deployment, and analytics support across Client’s portfolio companies. Services include: (i) asset-level data ingestion, (ii) modeling pipeline deployment, and (iii) reporting integration into existing finance systems.

Responsibilities (Client)
Client shall provide system access credentials, environment endpoints, and non-public datasets required for service delivery.

Responsibilities (Service Provider)
Service Provider shall deploy infrastructure components, perform testing, and deliver production integration within the agreed commercial timeframe.

clauses.clause_text:
Responsibilities (Client)
Client shall provide system access credentials, environment endpoints, and non-public datasets required for service delivery.

Responsibilities (Service Provider)
Service Provider shall deploy infrastructure components, perform testing, and deliver production integration within the agreed commercial timeframe.

Master_Service_Agreement.section_text:
Term
This Agreement remains effective for twenty-four (24) months from the Effective Date unless terminated earlier.

Termination for Cause
Either Party may terminate with thirty (30) days’ written notice if the counterparty materially breaches obligations.

clauses.clause_text:
Term
This Agreement remains effective for twenty-four (24) months from the Effective Date unless terminated earlier.

Termination for Cause
Either Party may terminate with thirty (30) days’ written notice if the counterparty materially breaches obligations.

Master_Service_Agreement.section_text:
Performance Reporting
Monthly performance reports shall be provided including uptime %, data latency KPIs, exception logs, and SLA breaches.

Audit Rights
Client may request a compliance audit not more than twice annually.

clauses.clause_text:
Performance Reporting
Monthly performance reports shall be provided including uptime %, data latency KPIs, exception logs, and SLA breaches.

Audit Rights
Client may request a compliance audit not more than twice annually.

Payment_Terms_and_Fee_Schedule.section_text:
Fees are structured as a hybrid subscription + usage variable model. All fees are billed in INR.

Base Subscription
Monthly Platform Access Fee: INR 5,50,000.

Variable Usage Fees
Compute Execution Charges (per pipeline run): INR 4,500.
Storage Allocation (per TB/month): INR 11,000.

clauses.clause_text:
Base Subscription
Monthly Platform Access Fee: INR 5,50,000.

Variable Usage Fees
Compute Execution Charges (per pipeline run): INR 4,500.
Storage Allocation (per TB/month): INR 11,000.

Payment_Terms_and_Fee_Schedule.section_text:
Payment Terms
Payment due within fifteen (15) calendar days of invoice date. Late payments accrue interest @ 1.5% per month.

Currency & Taxes
All taxes, GST obligations, and withholding remittances are the responsibility of the Client.

clauses.clause_text:
Payment Terms
Payment due within fifteen (15) calendar days of invoice date. Late payments accrue interest @ 1.5% per month.

Currency & Taxes
All taxes, GST obligations, and withholding remittances are the responsibility of the Client.

Payment_Terms_and_Fee_Schedule.section_text:
Service Downtime
If availability falls below 99.3% uptime per calendar month, a 12% service credit shall be issued.

Termination Balance
Outstanding fees become immediately payable upon termination.

clauses.clause_text:
